text: A Star Is Born is a 1937 American romantic drama movie directed by William A. Wellman and Jack Conway. It stars Janet Gaynor, Fredric March, Adolphe Menjou, May Robson, Andy Devine, Lionel Stander, Owen Moore, Peggy Wood and was distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. It was nominated for 8 Oscars and 2 Academy Awards in 1938 and was remade three times in 1954, 1976 and 2018. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1937 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Jack Conway Category:Movies directed by William A. Wellman Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in North Dakota
title: A Star Is Born (1937 movie)
